title: Say we all have souls but only one soul gets to come back in another body to gain more experience in life. Will this soul grow more understanding with each life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh? Are you saying maybe each of us has several souls? Well that would happen if we had more than one soul,but we don’t. we have more that one spirit if you want to step that idea up an notch and yes that is probably a little of what goes one, except that they come in and out as a group and I have no idea if the ever reincarnate together again except for what the “faithful” say to me! I don’t believe everything I hear… Interesting…

Soul = Self. If this is understood the question doesn’t remain. Whoever has strong residual desires / identities will come back to continue. If one is imprisoned when he has lots of expectations from life, won’t he be desperate to break open from jail?
